name: Demeter Chain
description: Launched in April 2019 by a team based in Singapore, DMTC describes itself as an “Organic Food + Smart Micromarket + Blockchain” project and a child chain of Waltonchain implemented in the field of 'Internet of Things'. It uses Waltonchain’s IoT + Blockchain solution to address the pain points of agricultural development. It integrates Waltonchain’s basic platform with the goal of addressing agricultural problems in production, warehousing, logistics, stores, and after-sales. Using RFID Chips and blockchain technology, it seeks to enable the source traceability of organic food, thereby creating a safe and reliable logistics and information channel for organic food.
